dcterms:description: This dataset involves user simulations in dialogue systems, focusing on social signals and user adaptation in reinforcement learning-based dialogue management.

dcterms:description: This dataset provides a benchmarking environment for reinforcement learning-based task-oriented dialogue management, facilitating the evaluation of various dialogue strategies.
dcterms:title: Benchmarking Environment for Reinforcement Learning Based Task Oriented Dialogue Management
